messages.content: Good afternoon, how do you do?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. And yourself?
Yo, what’s good?
Hey! Not much—just hanging out. What about you?
Hey y’all, what’s going on?
Howdy! I’m doin’ just fine, thanks for askin’. How ‘bout yourself?
Howdy, partner! What’s new with you?
Doing well over here. How about you?
G’day mate, how ya goin’?
G’day! I’m doing well. Yourself?
Hiya! How have you been?
Hey there! I’ve been pretty good. How about you?
Hello there, how are things?
Hi! Things are going well, thank you. How about you?
Sup bro, how ya doin’?
Hey bro! I’m alright. You good?
Yo yo yo! What’s the word?
Yo yo! All good over here—just vibin’. What’s happening with you?
Greetings and salutations! How’s life treating you?
Greetings! Life’s treating me well, thank you. And you?
Top o’ the mornin’ to ya!
Top of the morning! Hope the day’s treating you well. How are you?
Hey there, how’s it going, eh?
Hey! Things are going well, thanks. How about you, eh?
¡Hola! ¿Qué tal?
¡Hola! Todo bien, gracias. ¿Y tú?
You alright?
Yeah, all good—cheers for asking. You alright?
Morning! What’s popping?
Morning! Not much—keeping things chill. What’s new with you?
Salam, friend. How’s life?
Wa-alaykum as-salam! Life’s good, thank you. How’s yours?
